meanings.definition: Failure or neglect to fulfill one's duties or obligations.
meanings.sent1: Her undutifulness in completing her homework led to a low grade.
meanings.sent2: The king was disappointed by the undutifulness of his subjects.
meanings.sent3: The undutifulness of the dog to fetch the ball amused the children.
meanings.sent4: The undutifulness of the clock to chime on time was like a rebellious act.
meanings.sent5: The undutifulness of the student to turn in assignments made the teacher frustrated.

meanings.definition: Lack of respect or obedience towards authority or parents.
meanings.sent1: His undutifulness towards his parents upset them greatly.
meanings.sent2: The undutifulness of the soldiers towards their commander led to chaos.
meanings.sent3: The undutifulness of the cat to listen to its owner's commands was amusing.
meanings.sent4: The undutifulness of the wind to follow a straight path was like a rebellious child.
meanings.sent5: The undutifulness of the student to follow school rules caused disruptions in class.
